title: Upcoming RPG titles of 2016
text:
Upcoming RPG titles of 2016 2003-  India   147   
When it comes to rpg games, all other genres of video games fall short to the magnificence of RPGs.The stimulating gameplay,   and powerful characters not only help rpgs deliver a high-edge performance but also make them offer the best possible role playing experience. 2014 and 2015 have redefined the definition of rpgs through their enhanced visuals, stunning audio effects and, above all, awesome plots. But we know that the hearts of rpg lovers are not yet completely filled but the upcoming rpg titles of 2016 surely will. We are standing on the edge of the rpg evolution and who knows they might get even more real! Let's discuss about the 3 most talked about new rpg games slated to be released in 2016. 
· Fallout 4: Fallout 4 is perhaps the most talked about RPG of recent times. With lot of speculations revolving around its potentiality and storyline, Fallout 4 is sure to outweigh its predecessors in all possible spheres. The latest gameplay demo has made us believe that Fallout4 might become the biggest RPG of all time. This is because the game offers innumerous choices of gameplay to the users thus granting playing style and strategy independency. As a result, the alternate storylines and alternate endings come into effect which makes the game enormously large. For rpg fanatics, Fallout 4 might become their personal favourites. 
· World of Final Fantasy: If someone thinks that spinoffs are limited to superhero films, then World of Final Fantasy will change their thoughts once and for all.This interactive rpg acts as a spin-off to the widely popular Final Fantasy series and promises to continue the legend of the game. The plot follows two twins getting stranded on the Final Fantasy world of Grimoire and follows similar gameplay elements throughout the story. In addition to that, it brings out old characters from the prequels along with introducing new strong characters to the game. RPGs have never been this intimidating. 
· Horizon Zero Dawn: One of the most hardcore action role playing games of all time, Horizon Zero Dawn specially designed for the Sony PlayStation4 and developed by Guerrilla Games, will change the meaning of rpgs for ever. The player has to serve the role of a skilled hunter to survive in a post-apocalyptic earth reigned by vicious machines.   use of hand-made weapons like bows and arrows that can be used to attack the machines and immobilize them after a few strikes. The game is surely one of the perfect reasons to get hold of a PlayStation 4. After all Horizon Zero Dawn is going to be one of the best rpg games of 2016. ...
